## Repositories

- [github.com/tbep-tech](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbep-tech.github.io): Github organization
    
- [tbep-tech.github.io](https://github.com/tbep-tech/tbep-tech.github.io): files for this Github website
    
- [tbeptools](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbeptools/): R package with utility functions for reading, analyzing, and visualizing TBEP data.  See the [vignette](https://tbep-tech.github.io/tbeptools/articles/intro.html) for a detailed overview of the package.
